room_title: Escape room "Escape Detention" by A Game of Rooms in Rockville
review: Game masters are great and look like they're having as much fun as we are. No countdown clock in room. One of the better waiting rooms we've been visited. Room aesthetics are very simple, but works given the classroom theme. There are a lot of puzzles that can be done in parallel, so probably better for large groups. Would work for groups of all ages. A really fun entry level room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Detention" by A Game of Rooms in Rockville
review: Great fun for our adult family of five, ages 31-65. We've done a number of escapes and the "Detention Room" was a formidable challenge. We got out with seconds to spare. Escape rooms are a great exercise for your brain!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Detention" by A Game of Rooms in Rockville
review: Went with my family for my daughters 17th Birthday. This was our first time to one of these. The four of us made it out of the Detention room with two minutes to spare. We had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Detention" by A Game of Rooms in Rockville
review: Super fun! We started with the classroom and We will definitely be back to do the prison room.
